vb10:4.2: satisambojjhaṅgo, dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo, vīriyasambojjhaṅgo, pītisambojjhaṅgo, passaddhisambojjhaṅgo, samādhisambojjhaṅgo, upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo.
vb10:5.2: Idha bhikkhu satimā hoti paramena satinepakkena samannāgato, cirakatampi cirabhāsitampi saritā hoti anussaritā—
vb10:6.1: So tathā sato viharanto taṃ dhammaṃ paññāya pavicinati pavicarati parivīmaṃsamāpajjati—
vb10:7.1: Tassa taṃ dhammaṃ paññāya pavicinato pavicarato parivīmaṃsamāpajjato āraddhaṃ hoti vīriyaṃ asallīnaṃ—
vb10:11.1: So tathā samāhitaṃ cittaṃ sādhukaṃ ajjhupekkhitā hoti—
vb10:12.2: satisambojjhaṅgo, dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo, vīriyasambojjhaṅgo, pītisambojjhaṅgo, passaddhisambojjhaṅgo, samādhisambojjhaṅgo, upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo.
vb10:13.2: Atthi ajjhattaṃ dhammesu sati, atthi bahiddhā dhammesu sati.
vb10:13.3: Yadapi ajjhattaṃ dhammesu sati tadapi satisambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.
vb10:13.4: Yadapi bahiddhā dhammesu sati tadapi satisambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati. #1
vb10:14.2: Atthi ajjhattaṃ dhammesu pavicayo, atthi bahiddhā dhammesu pavicayo.
vb10:14.3: Yadapi ajjhattaṃ dhammesu pavicayo tadapi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.
vb10:14.4: Yadapi bahiddhā dhammesu pavicayo tadapi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati. #2
vb10:15.2: Atthi kāyikaṃ vīriyaṃ, atthi cetasikaṃ vīriyaṃ.
vb10:15.3: Yadapi kāyikaṃ vīriyaṃ tadapi vīriyasambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.
vb10:15.4: Yadapi cetasikaṃ vīriyaṃ tadapi vīriyasambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati. #3
vb10:16.2: Atthi savitakkasavicārā pīti, atthi avitakkaavicārā pīti.
vb10:16.3: Yadapi savitakkasavicārā pīti tadapi pītisambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.
vb10:16.4: Yadapi avitakkaavicārā pīti tadapi pītisambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati. #4
vb10:17.3: Yadapi kāyapassaddhi tadapi passaddhisambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.
vb10:17.4: Yadapi cittapassaddhi tadapi passaddhisambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati. #5
vb10:18.2: Atthi savitakko savicāro samādhi, atthi avitakko avicāro samādhi.
vb10:18.3: Yadapi savitakko savicāro samādhi tadapi samādhisambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.
vb10:18.4: Yadapi avitakko avicāro samādhi tadapi samādhisambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati. #6
vb10:19.2: Atthi ajjhattaṃ dhammesu upekkhā, atthi bahiddhā dhammesu upekkhā.
vb10:19.3: Yadapi ajjhattaṃ dhammesu upekkhā tadapi upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.
vb10:19.4: Yadapi bahiddhā dhammesu upekkhā tadapi upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati. #7
vb10:20.2: satisambojjhaṅgo, dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo, vīriyasambojjhaṅgo, pītisambojjhaṅgo, passaddhisambojjhaṅgo, samādhisambojjhaṅgo, upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo.
vb10:21.2: Idha bhikkhu satisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ virāganissitaṃ nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ, dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti … pe …
vb10:21.8: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ virāganissitaṃ nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ.
vb10:24.2: satisambojjhaṅgo, dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo, vīriyasambojjhaṅgo, pītisambojjhaṅgo, passaddhisambojjhaṅgo, samādhisambojjhaṅgo, upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo.
vb10:25.2: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi … pe … paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye satta bojjhaṅgā honti—
vb10:26.2: Yā sati anussati … pe … sammāsati satisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ—
vb10:27.2: Yā paññā pajānanā … pe … amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ—
vb10:28.2: Yo cetasiko vīriyārambho … pe … sammāvāyāmo vīriyasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ—
vb10:29.2: Yā pīti pāmojjaṃ āmodanā pamodanā hāso pahāso vitti odagyaṃ attamanatā cittassa pītisambojjhaṅgo—
vb10:30.2: Yā vedanākkhandhassa saññākkhandhassa saṅkhārakkhandhassa viññāṇakkhandhassa passaddhi paṭippassaddhi passambhanā paṭippassambhanā paṭippassambhitattaṃ passaddhisambojjhaṅgo—
vb10:31.2: Yā cittassa ṭhiti … pe … sammāsamādhi samādhisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ—
vb10:32.2: Yā upekkhā upekkhanā ajjhupekkhanā majjhattatā cittassa upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo—
vb10:34.2: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi … pe … paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, yā tasmiṃ samaye sati anussati sammāsati satisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ—
vb10:34.6: Avasesā dhammā satisambojjhaṅgasampayuttā … pe … avasesā dhammā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgasampayuttā … pe … avasesā dhammā vīriyasambojjhaṅgasampayuttā … pe … avasesā dhammā pītisambojjhaṅgasampayuttā … pe … avasesā dhammā passaddhisambojjhaṅgasampayuttā … pe … avasesā dhammā samādhisambojjhaṅgasampayuttā.
vb10:35.2: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi … pe … paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, yā tasmiṃ samaye upekkhā upekkhanā ajjhupekkhanā majjhattatā cittassa upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo—
vb10:37.2: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi … pe … paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, yo tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti … pe … avikkhepo hoti—
vb10:37.8: Tasseva lokuttarassa kusalassa jhānassa katattā bhāvitattā vipākaṃ vivicceva kāmehi … pe … paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ suññataṃ, tasmiṃ samaye satta bojjhaṅgā honti—
vb10:38.2: Yā sati anussati … pe … sammāsati satisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ—
vb10:39.2: Yā upekkhā upekkhanā ajjhupekkhanā majjhattatā cittassa upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo—
vb10:41.2: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi … pe … paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti … pe … avikkhepo hoti.
vb10:41.8: Tasseva lokuttarassa kusalassa jhānassa katattā bhāvitattā vipākaṃ vivicceva kāmehi … pe … paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, yā tasmiṃ samaye sati anussati sammāsati satisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ—
vb10:41.12: Avasesā dhammā satisambojjhaṅgasampayuttā … pe … avasesā dhammā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgasampayuttā … pe … avasesā dhammā vīriyasambojjhaṅgasampayuttā … pe … avasesā dhammā pītisambojjhaṅgasampayuttā … pe … avasesā dhammā passaddhisambojjhaṅgasampayuttā … pe … avasesā dhammā samādhisambojjhaṅgasampayuttā.
vb10:42.2: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi … pe … paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti … pe … avikkhepo hoti.
vb10:42.8: Tasseva lokuttarassa kusalassa jhānassa katattā bhāvitattā vipākaṃ vivicceva kāmehi … pe … paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ suññataṃ, yā tasmiṃ samaye upekkhā upekkhanā ajjhupekkhanā majjhattatā cittassa upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo—
vb10:45.2: satisambojjhaṅgo, dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo, vīriyasambojjhaṅgo, pītisambojjhaṅgo, passaddhisambojjhaṅgo, samādhisambojjhaṅgo, upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo.
vb10:46.1: Sattannaṃ bojjhaṅgānaṃ kati kusalā, kati akusalā, kati abyākatā  … pe … kati saraṇā, kati araṇā?
vb10:49.2: cha bojjhaṅgā siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, siyā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā. #2
vb10:53.1: Siyā savitakkasavicārā, siyā avitakkavicāramattā, siyā avitakkaavicārā. #6
vb10:54.1: Pītisambojjhaṅgo na pītisahagato, sukhasahagato, na upekkhāsahagato;
vb10:54.2: cha bojjhaṅgā siyā pītisahagatā, siyā sukhasahagatā, siyā upekkhāsahagatā. #7
vb10:63.1: Na maggārammaṇā, siyā maggahetukā, siyā maggādhipatino;
vb10:64.1: Siyā uppannā, siyā anuppannā, siyā uppādino. #17
vb10:65.1: Siyā atītā, siyā anāgatā, siyā paccuppannā. #18
vb10:67.1: Siyā ajjhattā, siyā bahiddhā, siyā ajjhattabahiddhā. #20
vb10:72.2: Dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo hetu ceva sahetuko ca, cha bojjhaṅgā na vattabbā “hetū ceva sahetukā cā”ti, sahetukā ceva na ca hetū.
vb10:72.3: Dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca, cha bojjhaṅgā na vattabbā “hetū ceva hetusampayuttā cā”ti, hetusampayuttā ceva na ca hetū.
vb10:72.4: Cha bojjhaṅgā na hetū sahetukā, dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo na vattabbo “na hetusahetuko”tipi, “na hetuahetuko”tipi.
vb10:76.4: Na vattabbā “āsavā ceva sāsavā cā”tipi, sāsavā ceva no ca āsavātipi.
vb10:76.5: Na vattabbā “āsavā ceva āsavasampayuttā cā”tipi, “āsavasampayuttā ceva no ca āsavā”tipi.
vb10:83.1: Pītisambojjhaṅgo appītiko, cha bojjhaṅgā siyā sappītikā, siyā appītikā.
vb10:83.2: Pītisambojjhaṅgo na pītisahagato, cha bojjhaṅgā siyā pītisahagatā, siyā na pītisahagatā.
vb10:83.3: Pītisambojjhaṅgo sukhasahagato, cha bojjhaṅgā siyā sukhasahagatā, siyā na sukhasahagatā.
vb10:83.4: Pītisambojjhaṅgo na upekkhāsahagato, cha bojjhaṅgā siyā upekkhāsahagatā, siyā na upekkhāsahagatā.
